name: acomics-crop
description: Acomics crop and resize library written in TypeScript

scripts.release:prepare: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.release:major: npm run release:prepare && npm version major && npm run release:create
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:prepare && npm version minor && npm run release:create
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:prepare && npm version patch && npm run release:create
